Package com.game.core.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.behaviour.base.PositionWrapper
com.game.core.behaviour.base.GameObject
com.game.core.behaviour.base.CollidableGameObject
com.game.core.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Positionable, Renderable, Updatable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bonus, BreakableBlock, Bullet, Player
public abstract class Entity extends CollidableGameObject implements Collidable, Renderable, Updatable
Represents an abstract entity in the game world. This serves as a base class for entities with specific behaviors such as movement, collision handling, and rendering.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(Tile tile, Bounds hitbox)
      Constructs a new Entity with the given visual representation and hitbox bounds.
      Parameters:
      tile - the Tile representing the entity's appearance on the screen.
      hitbox - the Bounds defining the entity's collision box.

  • Method Details

    • getVelocity

      public float[] getVelocity()
      Calculates and retrieves the current velocity vector of the entity based on its rotation angle.
      Returns:
      an array containing the velocity components [x, y].

    • move

      protected void move(double deltaTime)
      Moves the entity in the direction of its velocity, handling collisions and boundary constraints.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time elapsed since the previous frame.

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draws the entity on the specified graphics context. If debugging is enabled, the entity's hitbox will also be rendered.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Renderable
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to render the entity on.

    • render

      public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the visual appearance of the entity on the specified graphics context.
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to render the entity on.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile()
      Specified by:
      getTile in interface Renderable

    • setState

      public void setState(boolean active)
      Sets the active state of the entity, determining if it should be updated or rendered.
      Parameters:
      active - true to activate the entity, false to deactivate it.

    • getState

      public boolean getState()
      Checks whether the entity is active.
      Returns:
      true if the entity is active, otherwise false.

    • getSpeed

      public float getSpeed()

    • setSpeed

    • getRotationAngle

      public float getRotationAngle()

    • setRotationAngle

      protected void setRotationAngle(float rotationAngle)
      Sets the rotation angle of the entity, constrained within a 0-360 degree range.
      Parameters:
      rotationAngle - the new rotation angle to set.

    • getCm

      public CollisionManager getCm()
      Retrieves the collision manager assigned to the entity.
      Returns:
      the CollisionManager handling the entity's collisions.

    • setCm

      public void setCm(CollisionManager cm)
      Sets the collision manager responsible for handling the entity's collision logic.
      Parameters:
      cm - the CollisionManager to assign.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the specified collision manager is null.
